item.description:
I initially listed the start time as 10 pm, but it's 10 am. Thanks to Juliet for pointing this out. - Nicole

Another Brattle marathon as group event -- this time for anime. It's a 24 hour marathon, but I don't expect anyone to stay that long. To fortify ourselves for hours upon hours of Japanese animation, we will meet at IHOP for a pre-film festival breakfast.

17 Titles, 24 Hours, 1 Survivor, No Rules! Plus special guests, give-aways and a Cosplay Contest!

$25 for students/advanced purchasers, $35 otherwise

Guest of Honor:
Nancy Novotny, the English voice of "Yomi" from Azumanga Daioh!, Madlax, Yuka from Elfen Lied

All titles to be shown in the original Japanese language with English subtitles except where noted

Confirmed:

Nausicaa of the Valley of the Wind
Eureka Seven
Origin: Spirits of the Past
The Real Folk Blues: Cowboy Bebop episodes 5, 25 and 26
Great Teacher Onizuka
Otaku no Video
Gantz
Azumanga Daioh! (English Dub)
Elfen Lied (English Dub)
Tenchi Muyo
Nerima Daikon Brothers
The Fan-Made Parody: This is Otakudom
and many surprises!
item.name: Brattle Anime Festival
